title: How good is Springboard's Data Science course? What are the alternatives to this course? - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers in Data Science

response.answer_text: I completed the springBoard data science course a few days back . If you are good at CS basics and utilize the features of the course then it is good. We will have prep course for who are not from CS background. It will have 1:1 industry mentorship from mentors having around 5–15 years of experience as senior data scientists or tech leaders in the domain from product based companies. They will map to mentor based on your exp and profile so Mentorship plays a big role in the course because it is the handy how you use your mentor will decide how worth this course . You will have a min of 30 mentorship calls and max of 40 based on your face There will be career coaches who will review the LinkedIn profiles , Resumes , Negotiations and how to apply the jobs . They have to increase this service because they are just providing the current openings in word file .It is good if they provide referals and help us in career transition with in 6–9 months of the course completion. Coming to the alternatives there is different courses from Great Lakes , Upgrad with Iiit-banglore , simpli-learn etc.,Every course has its own pros and cons .
